description: Final Salute Inc. provides homeless women Veterans and their children with safe and suitable housing. Founded in 2010 by a female veteran, FSI has served over 5,000 women veterans and children through transitional housing, emergency financial assistance, employment support, and child care subsidies. Programs are available nationwide.

programs.name: H.O.M.E. Program
programs.description: Transitional housing program providing safe and suitable housing for homeless women veterans and their children. Works with veterans to establish a plan towards independence.

programs.name: S.A.F.E. Program
programs.description: Emergency financial assistance program for women veterans and their children who are homeless, facing homelessness, or under financial strain.

programs.name: Next Uniform
programs.description: Employment transition support program providing professional clothing, shoes, headshots, and makeovers to help women veterans transition to civilian careers.

eligibility.notes: Programs available nationwide regardless of location

statistics.note: Female veterans are 3x more likely to be homeless than male counterparts
